about_the_game:
Installment and update
To install and run the DLC smoothly, players need to purchase the official version of The Vigilant Villa in the first place, which includes all contents from [ Chapter 1 to 8 ]as well as the [Tracing back Plots] part. As you’re playing, don’t forget to check the network connection of your device.

The Vigilant Villa: Before Sunset- Extra Story lines of Issac Chen, Emily Tong and George He

Restlessness, Anxiousness, Sorrow, Hatred ...... those floating clouds just don’t get my emotions at all.
Look at the dark nightfall, a heavy rain is doomed to come, isn’t it?
Quietness by my side. Time stands still.
Some are worried, imploring things would come to an end, here and now.
Some look up, waiting for the clear sky after all those clouds thin out.
Some bide their time patiently, straddling between Samsara and Nirvana.
My emotions are erased.
I’m awaiting verdicts on.

short_description: The Vigilant Villa is a plots-oriented, texts-based AVG adventure game inheriting the classic “A locked room mystery" story mode. Where the game heads towards is completely decided by player’s own deductions and choices.
